languages.text: "И я даю клятву, что не покину станцию, не отдамся сну, не омою свое тело, пока последний преступник, скрывающийся в этом беззаконном логове, не предстанет перед Его Правосудием!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"
languages.original_text: "И я даю клятву, что не покину станцию, не отдамся сну, не омою свое тело, пока последний преступник, скрывающийся в этом беззаконном логове, не предстанет перед Его Правосудием!"

traits.locale_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

"And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

languages.text: “愿所有人听到我的誓言：我绝不会离开这座星站，我绝不会屈服于睡眠的诱惑，我绝不会清洗我的身体，直到这个无法无天的巢穴中每个罪犯都接受神皇的审判为止！”
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: “愿所有人听到我的誓言：我绝不会离开这座星站，我绝不会屈服于睡眠的诱惑，我绝不会清洗我的身体，直到这个无法无天的巢穴中每个罪犯都接受神皇的审判为止！”

languages.text: 「私の誓いを聞いてほしい。私はこのステーションから去ることはない。睡眠をとることもなく、体も洗わせない。この無法の地に潜む犯罪者が一人残らず、主の裁きを受けるまでは！」
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の誓いを聞いてほしい。私はこのステーションから去ることはない。睡眠をとることもなく、体も洗わせない。この無法の地に潜む犯罪者が一人残らず、主の裁きを受けるまでは！」

languages.text: «Y que mi juramento sea escuchado: ¡No abandonaré esta estación, no cederé ante el sueño, no dejaré que mi cuerpo sea lavado hasta que el último criminal que se esconde en esta guarida sin ley haya tenido Su juicio!».
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: «Y que mi juramento sea escuchado: ¡No abandonaré esta estación, no cederé ante el sueño, no dejaré que mi cuerpo sea lavado hasta que el último criminal que se esconde en esta guarida sin ley haya tenido Su juicio!».

languages.text: "Und mein Eid soll vernommen werden: Ich werde diese Station nicht verlassen, ich werde nicht schlafen, ich werde meinen Körper nicht waschen lassen, bis auch der letzte Verbrecher, der sein Gesicht in diesem gesetzlosen Sündenpfuhl versteckt, sich seinem Urteil gestellt hat!"
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: "Und mein Eid soll vernommen werden: Ich werde diese Station nicht verlassen, ich werde nicht schlafen, ich werde meinen Körper nicht waschen lassen, bis auch der letzte Verbrecher, der sein Gesicht in diesem gesetzlosen Sündenpfuhl versteckt, sich seinem Urteil gestellt hat!"

languages.text: « J'en fais le serment : je ne quitterai pas cette station, je ne cèderai pas au sommeil et je ne me laverai pas tant que tous les criminels qui se cachent dans ce cloaque sans foi ni loin n'auront pas subi Son jugement ! »
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: « J'en fais le serment : je ne quitterai pas cette station, je ne cèderai pas au sommeil et je ne me laverai pas tant que tous les criminels qui se cachent dans ce cloaque sans foi ni loin n'auront pas subi Son jugement ! »

languages.text: "Ve buraya yazıyorum: Bu kanunsuz inde gizlenen her bir suçlu O'nun adaletiyle yüzleşmeden bu istasyonu terk etmeyeceğim, uykuya mağlup olmayacağım, bedenimin temizlenmesine izin vermeyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "And let my vow be heard: I shall not leave this station, I shall not yield to sleep, I shall not let my body be washed until every last criminal who hides in this lawless den has faced His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: "Ve buraya yazıyorum: Bu kanunsuz inde gizlenen her bir suçlu O'nun adaletiyle yüzleşmeden bu istasyonu terk etmeyeceğim, uykuya mağlup olmayacağım, bedenimin temizlenmesine izin vermeyeceğim!"
